subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dan Giese earned a promotion — primarily as a long reliever behind Joba Chamberlain — by going 4-2 with a 1.98 earned run average for Scranton.
snippet: Dan Giese earned a promotion — primarily as a long reliever behind Joba Chamberlain — by going 4-2 with a 1.98 earned run average for Scranton.
